City Council
============

**Meetings**
------------

* 6:30 p.m.
* 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month

**Meeting Location**

* Cockrell Hill City Hall  
  4125 W. Clarendon Drive  
  Cockrell Hill, Texas 75211

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/DocumentCenter/Index/69)

![2024 May City Council Image](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=2066)Left to right:  Mayor Luis D. Carrera; Council member Miriam Rodriguez, Place 1; Council member Alejandra Arriaga, Place 3; Council member Anna Zayas Rodriguez, Place 3, Council member Robert Arredondo, Place 4; and City Manager Bret Haney. Not pictured Rene Hudson Franklin, Place 2.

Members
-------

* [Luis D. Carrera](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/Directory.aspx?DID=21), Mayor  
  Term expires: May 2026
* [Miriam Rodriguez](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/Directory.aspx?DID=21), Place 1  
  Term expires: May 2026
* [Rene Hudson](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/Directory.aspx?EID=19) Franklin, Place 2  
  Term expires: May 2026
* [Alejandra Arriaga](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/directory.aspx?EID=49), Place 3  
  Term expires: May 2025
* [Robert Arredondo](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/directory.aspx?EID=41), Place 4  
  Term expires: May 2025
* [Anna Zayas Rodriguez](https://cityofcockrellhill.us/directory.aspx?EID=50), Place 5  
  Term expires: May 2025

Meetings
--------

The City Council meets the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month at Cockrell Hill City Hall, 4125 W. Clarendon Drive. Meetings start at 6:30 p.m. Members of the public are welcome to attend all meetings and comment on items being considered by the Council.

More Information
----------------

For more information on the Cockrell Hill City Council, City Council Meetings, or general information about Cockrell Hill [email the City Council](mailto:info@cockrell-hill.tx.us).
